FileFormat.FormatDescription: Android 4.4 introduced the ability to capture all Bluetooth HCI packets and save them to a file, typically called btsnoop_hci.log. The BtSnoop file format closely resembles the snoop format, https://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/PRONOM/fmt/781

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: 'btsnoop' string, null terminated. The next 4 bytes represent version number
